qas.question: Where is the village of Avoriaz located?
Where are the villages of Wengen and Zermatt located?
Why are villages considering becoming car free zones?

context: Some high mountain villages, such as Avoriaz (in <a0_0>France<a0_0/>), Wengen, and Zermatt (in <a1_0>Switzerland<a1_0/>) are accessible only by cable car or cog-rail trains, and are car free. Other villages in the Alps are considering becoming car free zones or limiting the number of cars for <a2_0>reasons of sustainability<a2_0/> of the fragile Alpine terrain.
